title: Spotify now allows all creators in select regions to publish video podcasts
content:
Lately, our digital world has been adding more focus on the video format. A few years ago, popular content mostly revolved around text, audio, and photos. Now new video editing and publishing tools are emerging on some of the most commonly used services. Live video streams and TikTok-like short videos across many famous apps are

The post Spotify now allows all creators in select regions to publish video podcasts appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Spotify now allows all creators in the US, UK, New Zealand, Australia, and Canada to publish video podcasts on the platform.
